personal.name: Fidelzky
personal.title: WordPress Developer & Vibe Coder
personal.bio: Passionate WordPress developer specializing in AI-assisted software development (vibe coding). Using natural language to describe goals and leveraging AI tools to generate clean, efficient code. Crafting digital experiences with custom themes, plugin development, and performance optimization.

services.title: Custom WordPress Theme & AI-Enhanced UI/UX Design

services.description: Creating experience-driven e-commerce storefronts on WordPress that convert visitors into customers with seamless shopping experiences.

services.description: Optimizing your WordPress site for blazing-fast performance using AI-assisted analysis and optimization techniques.

services.title: Vibe Coding: AI-Assisted Development
services.description: AI-assisted software development (vibe coding) where goals are described in natural language and AI generates the code. Accelerating development and delivering innovative solutions with intelligent code assistance.

services.title: AI-Assisted SaaS Tools & Platform Development
services.description: Building scalable SaaS platforms and tools powered by AI assistance, leveraging vibe coding principles to rapidly develop and deploy innovative software-as-a-service solutions.
features: Rapid prototyping with natural language workflows

projects.title: FotoBrain
projects.description: A modern photography and image processing platform built with WordPress, featuring advanced image management, gallery systems, and user-friendly interfaces for photographers and visual content creators.

projects.title: ChatLLM - FetchLawyer
projects.description: An AI-powered legal chatbot platform built with Large Language Model technology, providing intelligent legal assistance and consultation services through conversational interfaces for legal professionals and clients.

projects.title: Lawyerix
projects.description: A comprehensive legal services platform and lawyer directory built on WordPress, connecting clients with legal professionals through an intuitive interface with search, booking, and consultation features.

testimonials.name: Carol H.
testimonials.text: I am delighted to provide a glowing testimony for the remarkable work undertaken by Fidelzky who has recently crafted an exceptional website for my business. The commitment to excellence, coupled with an innate ability to understand and implement customer preferences, truly sets him apart in his field. From the outset, Fidelzky demonstrated a genuine willingness to listen attentively to my requirements. His ability to grasp the essence of my vision for the website was impressive, and has become a stunning reality. Throughout the design process, he remained receptive to feedback, making adjustments promptly and with precision. This level of attentiveness ensured that the final product not only met but exceeded my expectations. One of the most impressive aspects of working with Fidelzky is his ability to work quickly without compromising quality. Despite tight deadlines, he delivered the project ahead of schedule, demonstrating a remarkable level of efficiency and dedication to his craft. This swift turnaround time allowed me to launch my website sooner than anticipated, which has had a positive impact on my business. I wholeheartedly recommend Fidelzky to anyone in need of professional website design services and have already recommended him to some of my friends. I am confident that he will continue to exceed expectations for all his clients.

testimonials.name: Rick S.
testimonials.text: Working with Fidel has been great. His skills as a web developer have consistently exceeded our expectations. Not only is he highly proficient, delivering excellent quality with every project, but his punctuality sets him apart. Fidel has a remarkable ability to manage time effectively, ensuring that all deadlines are met without compromising on quality. Fidel's personality truly makes the collaboration process enjoyable. He brings a positive attitude to the table, which fosters a creative and productive environment. His willingness to go the extra mile for his clients reflect his dedication to his clients. Fidel's blend of professionalism, timely delivery, and a great personality make him a standout web developer. I think what I enjoy most with him is that he is trustworthy and just a great guy. He will elevate your online presence.

testimonials.name: Joe B.
testimonials.text: Fidel is an outstanding WordPress Developer who truly understands both the technical and creative sides of web development. From the very beginning, he demonstrated professionalism, clear communication, and a strong commitment to quality. Fidel not only built a clean, functional, and visually appealing website but also optimized it for speed, security, and usability. What really stands out about Fidel is his problem-solving ability and attention to detail. He always takes the time to understand project goals and offers thoughtful solutions that go beyond expectations. Working with him has been smooth, efficient, and enjoyable from start to finish. I highly recommend Fidel to anyone looking for a reliable, skilled, and dedicated WordPress expert.

faq.question: What is vibe coding?
faq.answer: Vibe coding, a term coined by Andrej Karpathy, refers to an AI-first approach to software development where programmers interact with AI tools instead of manually writing most of the code. It relies on prompting AI agents, AI-assisted debugging, and rapid iteration with minimal concern for deep technical details.

faq.question: How does vibe coding differ from traditional coding?
faq.answer: Vibe coding focuses on prompting AI agents and accepting AI-generated solutions, while traditional coding involves manually writing and structuring code, deeply understanding system logic, and carefully architecting software for scalability and maintainability.

faq.question: Is vibe coding faster than traditional coding?
faq.answer: Yes, vibe coding dramatically accelerates development. Applications can be built in hours or days instead of weeks. Y Combinator's 2025 startup batch reported that 25% of founders built 95% of their codebases using AI-generated code.

faq.question: What are the main advantages of vibe coding?
faq.answer: Vibe coding offers unmatched speed, rapid prototyping, and low barrier to entry. You don't need a formal computer science background, and AI tools handle syntax, logic, and debugging. Replit CEO Amjad Masad stated that 75% of Replit users never write a single line of code‚Äîthey simply describe what they want.

faq.question: Will vibe coding replace traditional developers?
faq.answer: Not completely. The future is hybrid: vibe coding will dominate early-stage development and prototyping, while traditional coding remains essential for critical applications, infrastructure, cybersecurity, and large-scale systems. Developers will act more as AI copilots, guiding AI tools while maintaining human oversight.

faq.question: How can vibe coding be used with WordPress development?
faq.answer: Vibe coding revolutionizes WordPress development by allowing developers to describe custom themes, plugins, and features in natural language. AI tools like CursorAI and Replit can generate PHP, JavaScript, and CSS code for WordPress projects, dramatically speeding up custom theme development, plugin creation, and site customization.

faq.question: What are the benefits of using AI-assisted development for WordPress projects?
faq.answer: AI-assisted WordPress development offers faster turnaround times, rapid prototyping of custom themes and plugins, intelligent code suggestions for PHP and JavaScript, automated debugging assistance, and the ability to quickly iterate on design concepts. This allows WordPress developers to focus on creative solutions rather than repetitive coding tasks.

faq.question: Can AI tools help with WordPress theme and plugin development?
faq.answer: Yes! AI tools excel at generating WordPress theme templates, custom post types, plugin functionality, REST API endpoints, and WooCommerce customizations. By describing your requirements in natural language, AI can generate the PHP, JavaScript, and CSS code needed for custom WordPress solutions, significantly reducing development time.

faq.question: How does vibe coding accelerate WordPress development?
faq.answer: Vibe coding accelerates WordPress development by generating boilerplate code instantly, creating custom functions and hooks on demand, suggesting WordPress best practices automatically, and helping debug PHP and JavaScript errors quickly. What traditionally takes days or weeks can be accomplished in hours, allowing for faster client delivery and more time for creative problem-solving.

faq.question: Is it possible to use CursorAI or Replit for WordPress projects?
faq.answer: Absolutely! CursorAI and Replit are excellent for WordPress development. CursorAI provides intelligent code completion and generation directly in your editor, perfect for writing WordPress themes and plugins. Replit offers cloud-based development environments where you can describe WordPress features and get AI-generated code, making it easy to prototype and test WordPress solutions quickly.
